description: Retrieves account settings for the specified Amazon Chime account ID, such as remote control and dialout settings. For more information about these settings, see Use the Policies Page in the Amazon Chime Administration Guide.

nested_items.name: DisableRemoteControl
nested_items.description: Setting that stops or starts remote control of shared screens during meetings.

nested_items.name: EnableDialOut
nested_items.description: Setting that allows meeting participants to choose the Call me at a phone number option. For more information, see Join a Meeting without the Amazon Chime App.
